attributes.action: Introduce degrees of murder to the English legal system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many states in the USA have 'degrees of murder.' The schemes used differ across states, but the basic idea separates premeditated killing from non-premeditated killing. One scheme used across many states, including Pennsylvania classifies the degrees of murder as follows :

 First Degree Murder: All premeditated murders, and (in some states) murders involving certain especially dangerous crimes, such as arson or rape, or committed by an inmate serving a life sentence. 
Second Degree Murder: Non premeditated killing. 
Third Degree Murder: Any other murder
